sentence.text: The first decade of the 21st century was marked by progress in understanding the basic biology of generalized epilepsies including generalized/genetic epilepsies with febrile seizures plus (GEFS+) and GGE through studies of large families, discovering causative mutations in cardiac muscle cell action potential involved in contraction, positive regulation of sodium ion transport, inhibitory synapse assembly, and GABRA1.

entity.text: cardiac muscle cell action potential involved in contraction
positive regulation of sodium ion transport

sentence.text: Genome-wide studies examining common genetic risk factors identified common variants in cardiac muscle cell action potential involved in contraction, indicating a convergence of shared pathophysiological pathways in various types of epilepsies.

entity.text: cardiac muscle cell action potential involved in contraction
